scripts.updateNginx: echo "location /_slackcommand {\\n  proxy_set_header Host \$host;\\n  proxy_set_header X-Real-IP \$remote_addr;\\n  proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:$(node -e "console.log(require('./config/config.js').slackCommandServer.portNumber)");\\n}" > /app/nginx/slack-bot.conf && systemctl restart nginx
scripts.startCommandServer:
mkdir -p ./logs && echo "********  Slack Command Server is Running  ******** 
" && nohup node -e "require('./slack-command/index.js')(console)" > ./logs/slack-command-server.log 2>&1 &
scripts.startCommandServerDev:
mkdir -p ./logs && echo "********  Slack Command Server is Running  ******** 
" && nohup node -e "require('./slack-command/index.js')(console, true)" > ./logs/slack-command-server.log 2>&1 &
scripts.restartCommandServer: npm run stopCommandServer; npm run startCommandServer
scripts.restartCommandServerDev: npm run stopCommandServer; npm run startCommandServerDev
